description: Enterprise techniques used by Naid, ATT&CK software S0205 v1.0
name: Naid (S0205)

techniques.comment: Naid connects to external C2 infrastructure over port 443.[2]
Naid connects to C2 infrastructure and establishes backdoors over a custom communications protocol.[2][3]
Naid creates Registry entries that store information about a created service and point to a malicious DLL dropped to disk.[2]
Naid creates a new service to establish.[2]
Naid collects a unique identifier (UID) from a compromised host.[2]
Naid collects the domain name from a compromised host.[2]
